### Demon, Dretch

_Green, pig-faced demons with thick claws and an oily stench._

**LV** 2, **AL** C
**AC** 12, **HP** 11, **MV** near
**ATK** 1 claw +2 (1d6) or 1 gas

|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| +2 | +0 | +2 | -2 | -1 | -3 |

**Gas:** All in near DC 12 CON or blinded for 1d4 rounds.
